q: the Aptos area, just inside the 15th District, and registered to vote there. But it's not at all clear which of those residences will be in which district come 2012. Today, the Friends of John Laird for Senate 2012 committee's paperwork says he'll be seeking the 15th District seat. But he now lives in the 11th District again and is registered to vote there, according to 2010 campaign spokesman Bill Lockyer Maxfield.``
